articles.title: Asia Set for Cautious Open Ahead of Busy Data Week: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
Asia Morning Briefing: BOJ Rate-Hike Bets Trigger Asia Selloff and Bitcoin Slide - CoinDesk
articles.description: Short-term Japanese yields reached their highest level since 2008, strengthening the yen and pressuring leveraged crypto positions during Hong Kong trading hours.

articles.title: Varda says it has proven space manufacturing works — now it wants to make it boring - TechCrunch
articles.description: CEO Will Bruey says people often get Varda wrong. The company isn't "in the space industry; we're in-space industry," he said. Space is "just another place to ship to."

articles.title: Dow Jones Futures Fall; Trump Says He's Made Fed Chief Decision - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Leading stocks from many sectors stepped up last week.

articles.title: Bitcoin Plunges to Below $88,000 in Risk-Off Start to December - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Cryptocurrencies fell sharply on Monday, bringing fresh momentum to a wide-ranging selloff that appeared to have settled.

articles.title: Polymarket CEO says his prediction market is "the most accurate thing we have as mankind right now." - CBS News
articles.description: Shayne Coplan started Polymarket five years ago. He claims it is the most accurate tool out there for predicting future outcomes.

articles.title: The S&P 500 could hit 7,000 this week, while Trump hints at a Fed chair pick and Washington eyes this special election - Fortune
articles.description: "The S&P 500 would need to rise by just 2.2% to reach 7,000. That could happen this coming week, in our view."

articles.title: CME’s Data Center Adds More Cooling After Outage, CyrusOne Says - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The data center that supports CME Group Inc., one of the world’s largest derivatives exchanges, said it has bolstered its backup cooling capacity after overheating sparked a catastrophic 10-hour outage that roiled world markets on Friday.

articles.title: Data centers in Oregon might be helping to drive an increase in cancer and miscarriages - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon data centers might be adding to a public health crisis in Morrow County, Oregon.

articles.title: Trump Says He Has Made His Choice to Lead the Federal Reserve - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Sunday he has decided on his pick for the next Federal Reserve chair after making clear he expects his nominee to deliver interest-rate cuts.

articles.title: FDA links 10 children's deaths to COVID-19 vaccines. Doctors want proof - ABC News
Black Friday spending reflects K-shaped US economy - https-//www.semafor.com
articles.description: Black Friday spending reflected the forces shaping the US economy.

articles.title: New report examines how David Sacks might profit from Trump administration role - TechCrunch
articles.description: David Sacks’ role as President Donald Trump’s artificial intelligence and crypto czar could work out very well for his investments, according to a new report. However, Sacks fired back, calling the story a "nothing burger."

articles.title: Plane skids off icy runway as snow snarls post-Thanksgiving travel - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: In one terrifying incident for air travelers, a flight skidded off an icy runway amid the post-Thanksgiving travel rush.

articles.title: ChatGPT launched three years ago today - TechCrunch
articles.description: It’s no hyperbole to suggest that ChatGPT subsequently transformed the worlds of business and tech.

articles.title: Latest cheese recalls gets FDA’s most serious warning - TheStreet
articles.description: The cheese recall has an FDA Class I designation meaning consuming the product could cause illness or death.
